info.title: Event-Based Revenue Recognition Integration
info.description: The service first allows for a clearing of the balance sheet GL accounts, a procedure by which the open items belonging to one or more accounts are indicated as cleared. Second, it allows for using the revalue function, which recalculates the posted revenue recognition values if you have changed, for example, the planned cost. This service also allows changing the revenue recognition key that was originally assigned to a particular WBS element (project) to a new one.

x-sap-shortText: Clear or reevaluate the revenue recognition postings, and change the revenue recognition key for WBS elements (projects) using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Event-Based Revenue Recognition - Project-Based Services(1IL)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1IL " Link To BP ")
[Event-Based Revenue Recognition - Project-Based Services - IFRS(1P0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1P0 " Link To BP ")
[Event-Based Revenue Recognition - Project-Based Services - US GAAP(33O)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/33O " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Clears or reevaluates all revenue recognition postings for WBS elements (projects).
get.description: Clears or reevaluates all revenue recognition posting for WBS elements (projects), which enables the assigned object (such as a profit center) to be changed and revenue recognition valuesfor the new object to be reposted by means of a recalculation run.

parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: WBSElementExternalID
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Changes the revenue recognition key for a WBS element (project).
post.description: Changes the revenue recognition key that was originally assigned to a particular WBS element (project) to a new one.

parameters.name: WBSElementExternalID
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: RecognitionKey
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
